title: Vu Pixelight 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV  (65 QDV / 65 QDV -V1)

product_specification.In The Box: powercable,remote control battery manual,table stand ,wall mount bracket
product_specification.Color: Rear: Black, Stand: Grey, Front Bezel: Titanium Grey
product_specification.Analog TV Reception: Color-Sound Systems in VHF and UHF Band: PAL-D/K, B/G
product_specification.Digital TV Reception: Television Standard in VHF Band / UHF Band: DVB - T / T2
product_specification.Panel Type: High Bright A+ Grade UHD Panel
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG4, H.263, H.264, H.265, AVS, MVC, VP8, VP9
product_specification.Sound Technology: Dolby Digital and DTS True Sound
product_specification.Surround Sound: DTS Truebass, DTS TruSurround, DTS Dialog Clarity
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Speech, Late Night, Music, Theater
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, PCM, AC3, AAC, COOK, MP2
product_specification.Content Providers: Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Hungama Play, Yupp TV, Daily Motion, AccuWeather, Game Center, Wow TV, icflix, TED, Toon Goggles, Viaway, Plex, TV Browser, VEWD App Store, etc
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Premium Licensed Apps on Remote Hotkeys, Elite Picture with HDR10, Adaptive Contrast, Vu AnyView Cast, Remote on Smartphone, Software Version OSD Indication, Favorite Channels List, Power Off if No Signal, Program Lock, Time Shift
product_specification.Stand Type: Wall Mount and Table Top Stand
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is limited to manufacturing defects only. Parts and Labor Costs are Covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel
Modification or alteration of any nature is made in the electrical circuitry/or physical construction of the set
Installation/ repair work is carried out by persons/agency other than authorized by the company
The warranty does not cover any external accessories (such as battery, cable, carrying bag etc.)
Defects due to cause beyond control like lightning, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to service centre or purchaser's residence
Mentioned in the operating instruction manual supplied with this product or any cosmetic parts.
Original serial number is removed, obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
The product is not used according to instructions given in the instruction manual
Site (premises where the product is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details:
Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void
We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience.. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Elite Experience with Licensed Apps on R: With Vu’s 4-hotkeys feature on your remote, accessing your favourite apps and entertainment has never been this easy. With just a click of a button, you can activate your app list that comprises Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube and much more.
product_description.HDR10, High Bright 4K Panel, Adaptive Co: Thanks to the Pixelight 4K HDR10 feature, everything looks clear on the screen. The Adaptive Contrast feature keeps the content incredibly detailed. The Digital MPEG Noise Reduction feature reduces the visual noise and offers brilliant clarity. With Day and Night Modes, you can choose the best setting for a light or a dark environment. The Dynamic Mode gives your pictures an extra vivid boost.

review: BEST LED TV AT THIS PRICE BETTER THAN OTHER ALL RIVALS LED TV IN INDIA AT THIS PRICE .SECOND LED TV I HAVE PURCHASED FROM FLIPKART .FAST DELIVERY AND SAME DAY INSTALLATION THANK VU AND FLIPKART

Excellent product at this budget. The picture quality is much better than other brands offering 55" LED televisions at similar pricing. The brand VU being an American brand adds to consumer's inclination towards the product as most other television in this price range are wither made in China or India and their sustainability is a question mark. I have been using VU since last 3 years. All my bedrooms are equipped with 32 inch VU television and this 55 inch I purchaed for my living room. I think VU could add more accessories such as HDMI cable and multiple USB connectors or at least offer the same upon request by paying requisite amount. But that's not a big thing to bother as the price and quality describes the product in one phrase 'Value for Money'. More precisely, if you were to compare with Samsung and Panasonic LED TVs, VU is just one step on the staircase behind them but not to forget that Samsung and Panasonic LED TV of 55 inches would cost 20,000 more at least.

The TV is an excellent piece of work from the company as I just used it one day only so not goin' to say too much I'll give full feedback later but yes it sucks too much electricity so be ready for the increased electricity expenses, it's an ultra hd TV so it's sucking data like blood.

wonderful sound system. screen clarity also very good just purchased week back.
installation done very quick in just one day. but still now not received extended warranty card from flip kart..

picture quality is not much sharp n smooth I expected some smooth motion but its not there ,playing 30fps videos only when it plays 60fps videos then only you can expect some smooth motion n blur free picture n video quality...I didn't see 60fps videos on YouTube not there's no option to play the video with slow n fast modes you can see that options in laptops n computer. ...will check all types of features new let you know it's my one day usage review only

After using the TV for 10 days, following is my review:
- Delivery & Installation (5/5): Delivered as promised with open box inspection, and installed on same day. No problems here.
- Picture Quality (5/5): Excellent picture quality with vivid but natural colors. Very bright picture, the kind seen only in high end TVs. Excellent viewing angles with very little color/contract loss even at 45-deg.
- Upscaling (4/5): 4K is superlative. Full HD is excellent. HD is very good. SD is acceptable. The TV strives to put up good upscaling to make even 360p YouTube videos watchable.
- Audio (3.5/5): For all the fancy tech (24W output, Dolby Digital, DTS TruSurround, TruBass, TruDialog, blah blah), the sound is average. There is very little bass even with Bass Boost on and tweaking the Equalizer. That said, the audio is loud and clear even at high volume. However, this is not an issue for me as I hook it to my Home Theater. The output through Optical Digital port is excellent.
- Smartness (4/5): The interface is a bit slow (what you expect with 1 GB RAM and 4 GB Storage?) but once connected, there is very little lag. Dedicated buttons for Netflix, Prime Video and YouTube are a bonus. Many Apps are missing, but remember, this is not an Android TV. Mobile casting works flawlessly.
- Connectivity (4.5/5): Except Bluetooth, you have everything you need.
Things to consider for potential buyers: No doubt, this is an excellent choice at this price with great picture, good sound, very good picture upscaling, excellent connectivity and reasonable smartness. However, to complement the huge screen, you need better sound, so may have to invest in a soundbar. Not being an Android TV, you will miss many Apps and most importantly, voice control. With just 1GB Ram and 4GB Storage, it is not future proof. Also, there is no Bluetooth. But remember, this is also cheaper by atleast 4K as compared to Premium Android version. If you are OK with these small cons, this is the best choice.

#. It is NOT ANDROID OS. The OS present in TV is LINUX. You Cannot install play store android apps. You can install apps from pre installed app present in TV VEWD Store only.

# It does not support .mkv 4k video format files from YOUTUBE.

#. Good Picture quality.

# Good Sound quality.

# Reasonable price. Value for money

Really valuable for both money and quality, picture and sound amazing

Installation and demo was perfect

All excellent thank you flip kart for providing service and bringing high quality products to customers
worth for money with nice clarity and faster delivery.. delivery scheduled on time..

My biggest concern while buying this tv was color reproduction. I had bought a 39" VU tv before for my parents but the color reproduction in that wasn't good. However this one has pretty good quality colors. Coming to the sound quality, you won't need an external speaker for a moderately big hall. Connectivity wise it has sufficient (3) hdmi ports. I don't use the inbuilt OS, I pretty much use the fire tv stick. The tv also has the CEC option by which you can control the fire stick with TV remote itself however there is noticeable lag if you compare the response with native remote. Also has the the direct optical port for connecting external speakers. The remote is sturdy. I do miss lack of buttons on the tv, so if you misplace the remote you are out of luck. :) I am completely happy with the purchase. I did read review saying it consumes a lot of power, but it actually doesn't.

I must say its worth buying this product. Superb display and clarity. Smooth functioning, only I can see the sound system inbuild with this OLED if they can improve. Flipkart has delivered this product on time as promised - June 17, 2019 and has been installed on the same day. I really like the process which is implemented. The delivery boys and installation person have handled the product very carefully. The installation person is experienced one came up with all his requirements to mount the TV on wall. I didnt have to spare anything extra from my pocket.

I only have one suggestion that flipkart or vendor should arrange to take away the television boxes, thermocols from customers, now days its difficult to dispose off such things because of environmental issues.

Overall, satisfactory product and recommended to others.

Os is good I don't see any lags...

I am giving this review after 06 months of use of VU 4K (50 Inch) TV. Initially I was little bit worried, if the picture or build quality of VU tv is good or bad... but after using it for 06 months I have found that the pictures are awsome, specially HD and 4k and till now running very smoothly. The sound quality is also above average. Previously I considered that Branded TVs like, Sumsung, LG, Sony are only good, but after using Vu Tv I am convinced that even if the price is much lesser comparing to Samsung or LG etc. branded Tv, VU is exceptionally well in performance despite low in pocket. Hence, who are thinking to buy a new TV, can definitely consider VU Tv....I will give it 4.5 out of 5

The product is definitely awesome in al departments except for it's sound. It is installed in a 160sq ft. room and the sound seems a bit low according to it. Sometimes the sound is very low but when I restart the TV, it goes back to normal. It is very rare but it is there. Other than that, there is no better TV at this price.

Pros:
Picture quality is amazing for this budget. 4K content play well. HD upscaling is decent.
Smart TV functionalities are good and practical.
Amazing remote with hotkeys for Netflix, Prime and Youtube. Remote works with FireTV if connected to HDMI CEC which is super awesome! No need for an expensive smart TV!
Headphone jack.

Cons:
4K videos have flickering in high detailed moving frames with multiple black pixels, although not frequent. This is the primary difference between the expensive Sony or Samsung TV.

I bought this TV after going through all the reviews and comparison on YouTube and other sites and they are all right that this is the best TV you can buy on a Budget. Though i regret that i didn't bought the android version of this tv as there are no indian apps in vu store. Netflix, prime and youtube are there but if you want all the other apps as well then go for android version.

Overall - truly amazing picture quality at this price and better than many TV's much higher than this price.

Connectivity - enough options are there

Interface - a bit slow but not a deal breaker (obviously they can't put the best processors and memory at this price)

If you just care about the picture and build quality then go for this if you want more features then go for the android one.

I bought a 65” tv. It is awesome. Worth for money.

Writing this review after using the TV for couple of months.

Pros
1. The build quality is satisfactory.
2. Picture quality with a HD STB is amazing.
3. Pretty decent value for money.
4. Quick delivery and Installation, 2019 manufactured product.

Cons
1. The browser is more or less useless. Is slow and it is a pain to type and search as the remote lacks IR pointer.
2. The sound from the TV speakers are just about ok. There seems to be a software issue as the sound in not consistent across channels or even on the same channel. It suddenly gets loud during commercials or if there is some dance sequence and once it is over it will get very low. I have read other reviews complaining about this same issue so it’s not just me.
3. No option to side load any other app or browser.
4. Could not get it to record live content on to a pen drive.
5. Netflix and Prime apps keep forgetting the home WiFi network, need to reconnect each time.

Verdict

If you can ignore the poor sound management and don’t mind spending few extra minutes typing and searching content, this TV is good value for money. The picture quality is good and provides a nice viewing experience. So it does the basic job decently but other than that nothing much.

Overall good experience so far. On offer price I bought for Rs: 44,999 for 65 inches screen.

Writing this review after 2.5 years of purching this TV. Beware of purchasing VU TV. Company provides 2 years warranty & it will work fine for 2 years. As soon as 2 years are over, the TV will break down ( Has happened to 3 more ppl whom I know who had purchased). Then comes the biggest scam of extended warranty through Jeeves (Total waste of money). On a scale of 1-10 in service , I would rate them -10. Have been chasing them for 1.5 months now through mails, customer care yet have got assurances only but no resolution. The local ground team of service & customer care are in different orbits altogether with no communication. It took alomst 20 days to arrange for TV pick up after lot of hassle, post repair also TV was showing same problem. Again pick up done , Has been 18 days since last pick up yet no resolution. As per their policy if repair is not done in 30 days then they process for refund, but now they are even refuting that claim. Even after multiple calls & mails to initiate the refund since we no longer have faith in their service, they are reverting that order is under repair only. It has been such a pathetic/harrowing experience with the Jeeves team that I seriously don't want to purchase anything from them. I just want to get refund so that I am done with this scam.

So basically I am left with no TV, no refund till now & a long mail thread of customer care assurances that my query will be responded in next 2 business working days :|

Flipkart Team - Hope this review will find the right decision maker who can actually help out. Claim ID CLJPV01082100290
